channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Intuition
item.description: Intuition is simply a theory we haven’t yet put into words. Once we write down and share our intuition, it becomes more resilient, focused and useful ...

item.title: The Beauty Of Data: How Regional Customer Insights Can Unlock Growth
item.description: The beauty industry is closely tied to cultural identities, climates and social norms, making it essential to understand regional nuances.

item.title: Fast-Food Luxury: How QSRs Can Put The 'Value' Back In Value Meals
item.description: Through cutting-edge loyalty programs and restaurant technology, savvy QSRs are creating experiences that justify their new "luxury" status.

item.title: Apple’s ‘Groundbreaking’ New iPhone Update—What Does Samsung Do Now?
item.description: Apple has changed the game—how does Samsung ever compete with this?

item.title: AI Agents: Are We Ready For Machines That Make Decisions?
item.description: We are fast moving to level 3 of Artificial Intelligence - AI Agents. Does AI include sufficient reasoning for AI agents?
